values: 田；地；田地；田野；原野；旷野；野外；实地；现场；开阔地；广阔的一片；牧场；产地；矿田；（作特殊用途的）场地；运动场；比赛场；范围；领域；（全体）竞赛者；（全体）参赛者；战场；战地；（引力、电、磁）场；（望远镜、显微镜等的）视界；信息栏；[计]字符；字段；信息组；（Field）菲尔德（人名）
派出（球队、军队等）；派（球队、军队等）上场；使参加竞赛（或选举、战斗等）；[板球][棒球]截住；守住；接（球）；圆满答复；巧妙回答；处理；回应（电话或请求等）
田间的；田赛的；野外的；实地的；战役用的

synonym.mean: 领域；牧场；旷野；战场；运动场

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 保护；担任外场员（field的ing形式）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 主要指经选定在一段时间内作专题研究的方面或领域，含夸张意味。
指科学知识、活动等的领域或范围。
即可指科学、艺术、学问的领域或范围，又可指个人或机关职权的管辖范围。
指知识艺术、兴趣或人类活动的领域。
指有明显分界线的范围或领域，强调彼此不会干扰、跨越，各不相关。

word_group.brief_definition: 性滥交, 乱搞男女关系
在战斗中；参战（或参加演习）时的；在野外；在实地
行动的机会；阅兵；操练；体育运动日；农机展示日

bilingual.source: He is a giant in his field.
She is an expert in her field.
Teachers may also lead their local museums or historical societies for help in getting students more interested in this important field.
bilingual.target: 老师们也可以带领当地博物馆或历史学会来帮助学生对这个重要领域更感兴趣。
政治是一个复杂的领域。

bilingual.source: He is an authority in this field.
There are few experts in this field.
She is a known expert in her field.
bilingual.target: 她是她领域的已知专家。

bilingual.source: Needham is an expert in his field.
bilingual.target: 需要汉姆是他领域的专家。
他的研究领域非常广泛。

list.abstract: field（英、美[fiːld]），英语单词，作名词用，为场地；田；地。作动词用，为担任外场员负责接球；派上场；应付。作形容词用，为实地的；野外的。短语搭配有in the field of（在...领域），例句为“Today, the field is in transition.（如今，该领域正处在过渡之中）”。 field名词类近义词有domain、province、territory等，形容词类近义词有wild、feral，复数形式为fields。

yingyinNormal.en: I read up on my work a whole field of scientific inquiry that only exists because of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我做研究，认真工作，在科学研究的领域，因为你而存在的领域。

yingyinNormal.en: Not locking into a path too early gave me an opportunity to go into a new and life changing field.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有太早锁死自己的道路，让我有机会进入改变生活的全新领域。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Dr. Cooper, while you were away, we came up with a solution that would allow you to change your field of study.
yingyinNormal.zh: 库伯博士，在你不在的时候，我们想出了让你可以改变研究领域的方法了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm afraid if I take this, I might lose that special, unique something that makes me so successful in my field.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我怕我吃了这个药以后，可能会丧失那些让我在我的领域里如此成功的特质。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know if you've been following the news, Leonard, but there have been some terrific advancements in the field of torture.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道你最近看没看新闻，莱纳德，最近在拷问领域有很多很棒的进展。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, well, then don't work with Bert. Oh, but I like the work. Then work with him. Yeah, but I'm ashamed of the field.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那就别跟伯特合作呗。但我喜欢那研究。那就跟他合作。可我觉得那个领域很丢人。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you sane? With high speed Internet, you have at your fingertips the greatest advancement in the field of sex since the invention of the washcloth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你疯了吧？有了高速互联网，你的指尖下就是继小手帕之后性爱领域的最伟大的进步啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Cooper, this is my field. And I really believe Edmunds' is the better prospect. Why? Gargantua, that's why.
yingyinNormal.zh: Cooper，这是我的专业领域，并且我真的觉得Edmund那里更有希望。为什么？卡冈图亚，这就是原因。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, I'm the sole author on a paper being published in a distinguished journal that may change the course of my field.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我以唯一作者的身份在著名期刊上发表了自己的论文，而且有可能改变我研究的这个科学领域。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I see why you're confused. No, her news sounded important, but what you're forgetting is, it was an achievement in the field of biology. That's all about yucky, squishy things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你为什么会困惑，她的消息听上去很重要，可你忘了，那是生物学领域的成就，都是恶心黏黏的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: Here we have a highly gifted researcher in the field of particle physics whose work has brought him to the precipice of forever changing mankind's understanding of the universe. AKA me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一位在粒子物理学领域的超级天才科学家，他的成就关乎全人类的命运，从此改变对宇宙的理解，确切来说就是我。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not a mission. It's a field test.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不是任务，是实地测验。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm on this field, and they hike me the baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在球场上，他们叫我以儿子做裆下开球。

yingyinNormal.en: The force field. lt's a dome. We're at the edge of the arena.
yingyinNormal.zh: 电磁力场是个拱顶，我们在竞技场的边缘。

yingyinNormal.en: I was never a field agent. I always thought I'd be rather good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没做过外勤特工。我一直觉得自己能做得不错。

yingyinNormal.en: These guys are my friends. All the time, not just on the field.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们是我的朋友，一直都是，不只在球场上。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that is one of my degrees. My primary field is neuroscience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是我的学位之一，我的主修是神经系统学。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a field cricket. Yes! No, no, wait. Dr. Crawley, are you sure?
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是只普通黑蟋蟀。太好了！不，等等。克莱利教授， 你确定吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I suppose that field below Peckham wood could be made into a pitch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩卡姆林下面那块地也可以改造成球场吧。

yingyinNormal.en: And then I found something that made me understand why. Field trip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后我发现了一些东西让我明白了原因。实地考察。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 专业; 学科; 领域

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Just 25 per cent of the country's land is suitable for crop-growing, most of which is already occupied by arable <highlight>fields</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该国只有25%的土地适合种植农作物，其中大部分已经被耕地占据。

examination_example.sentence: More green <highlight>fields</highlight> will be converted for farming.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更多的绿地将被改造成农田。

examination_example.sentence: Progressives often support diversity mandates as a path to equality and a way to level the playing <highlight>field</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 进步人士通常支持多元化授权，认为这是实现平等的途径和公平竞争的方式。

sense_info_list.en: an area of activity or influence; a particular branch of study or sphere of activity or interest
sense_info_list.zh: 专业; 学科; 领域

examination_example.sentence: In the medical <highlight>field</highlight>, the pandemic meant that there were till clear shortages of doctors, nurses and other medical personnel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在医疗领域，大流行意味着医生、护士和其他医务人员明显短缺。

examination_example.sentence: Everything he achieved in life was earned the hard way and his success in the literary <highlight>field</highlight> was no exception.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他一生中所取得的一切都是通过艰苦的努力获得的，他在文学领域的成功也不例外。

examination_example.sentence: Giving more children this training could increase the number of people interested in the <highlight>field</highlight> and help fill the jobs gap.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给更多的孩子提供这种培训可以增加对该领域感兴趣的人数，并有助于填补就业缺口。

sense_info_list.en: deal with a difficult question, telephone call, etc.

examination_example.sentence: Now he's living in a council flat and <highlight>fielding</highlight> offers from literary agents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在他住在议会公寓里，处理文学经纪人的邀请。

examination_example.sentence: Archaeologists also may locate buried remains by using such technologies as ground radar, magnetic-<highlight>field</highlight> recording, and metal detectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考古学家也可以利用地面雷达、磁场记录和金属探测器等技术来定位埋藏的遗骸。

sense_info_list.en: carried out or working in the natural environment, rather than in a laboratory or office
to catch the ball and throw it back
the area that is visible, as through an optical instrument
a set of one or more adjacent characters comprising a unit of information
all the participants in a contest or sport

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指学术领域或活动和作用的范围等，强调选择和必要的限制。
着重指在理解、思考、调查、活动或应用等方面所能达到的范围。
着重指某物朝一个方向延伸的范围或长度，但常用于引申意义，指广度或研究、知识等的范围。
既可指人感觉或能力等到所达到的范围，也可指物可供选择的范围。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 实地考察；野战工事

word_family.mean: n. 场地；田；地；牧场；范围；领域；视场；视野；（Field）人名：菲尔德

sense_info_list.en: an area of activity or influence; a particular branch of study or sphere of activity or interest

examination_example.sentence: Commercial growing <highlight>fields</highlight> are astronomically huge and take thousands of man-hours to operate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商业发展领域好比是天文数字，需要大量的时间去运作。

examination_example.sentence: Today, the <highlight>field</highlight> is in transition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，该领域正处在过渡之中。

examination_example.sentence: Open data sharers are still in the minority in many <highlight>fields</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在许多领域，选择公开数据的分享者仍然是少数。

sense_info_list.en: an area of open land, especially one planted with crops or pasture, typically bounded by hedges or fences

examination_example.sentence: A season in the <highlight>field</highlight> will help determine which, if any, of the varieties are ready for commercialization.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只需要一个季节的实地试验，就可以帮助确定哪些品种(如果有的话)可以用于商业化推广。

examination_example.sentence: Now, Africa's largest economy is facing a food crisis as major tomato <highlight>fields</highlight> have been destroyed by an insect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，这个非洲最大的经济体正面临一场粮食危机，大量的番茄田被某昆虫摧毁。

word_usage.usage:
表示“在田野里”，介词用in；
表示“在球场上”，介词用on；
表示“在战场上”，介词用in或on皆可。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指知识艺术、兴趣或人类活动的领域。
主要指经选定在一段时间内作专题研究的方面或领域, 含夸张意味。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an area of activity or influence; a particular branch of study or sphere of activity or interest

examination_example.sentence: The experience of using IT penetrates almost the entire work <highlight>field</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用它的经验几乎渗透到整个工作领域。

examination_example.sentence: It often leads to innovations in other related <highlight>fields</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这经常导致其他相关领域的创新。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>field</highlight> of their special interest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们特别感兴趣的领域。

sense_info_list.en: an area of open land; especially one planted with crops or pasture; typically bounded by hedges or fences

examination_example.sentence: And the playing <highlight>field</highlight> is nothing close to level.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且比赛环境也不公平。

sense_info_list.en: used in names of animals or plants found in the open country; rather than among buildings or as cultivated varieties
deal with a difficult question; telephone call; or others
the region in which a particular condition prevails; especially one in which a force or influence is effective regardless of the presence or absence of a material medium
the area that is visible; as through an optical instrument

word_usage.usage:
表示“在田野里”，介词用in；
表示“在球场上”，介词用on；
表示“在战场上”，介词用in或on皆可。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指知识艺术、兴趣或人类活动的领域。
主要指经选定在一段时间内作专题研究的方面或领域，含夸张意味。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 田地; 田野; 场地; 领域; 野外

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 田地; 田野; 场地; 领域; 野外

examination_example.sentence: That way, cattlemen will know whether they need to move their cattle to another <highlight>field</highlight> for nutrition purposes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样一来，养牛人就会知道他们是否需要将牛群转移到另一块田地以获得营养。

examination_example.sentence: One morning I spotted a lost lamb when I was in the top <highlight>field</highlight>, near where a motorway cuts through my land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天早上，我在顶层的田地里发现了一只迷路的羔羊，就在一条高速公路穿过我的土地的地方。

examination_example.sentence: These colorful and sweet jewels form British Columbia's <highlight>fields</highlight> are little powerhouses of nutritional protection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些来自不列颠哥伦比亚省田野的五颜六色的甜美珠宝，是营养保护的小能量源。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an area of open land, especially one planted with crops or pasture, typically bounded by hedges or fences

examination_example.sentence: He thought it was difficult for him to find one bone in such a big <highlight>field</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他认为在这么大的一块地里很难找到一块骨头。

examination_example.sentence: Today, when I stand in that <highlight>field</highlight> which was once empty, I see trees about as tall as I am.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，当我站在那片曾空无一人的田野上时，我看到了和我一样高的树。

examination_example.sentence: At the beginning, you will find a soccer <highlight>field</highlight> in the first floating city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一开始，你会在第一个漂浮的城市里发现一个足球场。

sense_info_list.en: an area of activity or influence; a particular branch of study or sphere of activity or interest

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>field</highlight> grows, scientists aim to understand human-robot relationships better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着这一领域的发展，科学家们的目标是更好地理解人类与机器人之间的关系。

examination_example.sentence: Confucius, a pioneer in the <highlight>field</highlight> of education（教育）.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孔子，教育界的先驱。

examination_example.sentence: Huawei is a big company in the IT <highlight>field</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 华为是一家IT领域的大公司。

sense_info_list.en: used in names of animals or plants found in the open country, rather than among buildings or as cultivated varieties

examination_example.sentence: What fun it is to have a <highlight>field</highlight> trip on the Orange Island!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在橘子岛上进行野外旅行多么有趣啊！

examination_example.sentence: My class were on a school <highlight>field</highlight> trip last week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们班级上周进行了一次学校野外郊游。

examination_example.sentence: Who went on a school <highlight>field</highlight> trip last week?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁去参加了上周的学校野外郊游？

word_usage.usage:
表示“在田野里”，介词用in；
表示“在球场上”，介词用on；
表示“在战场上”，介词用in或on皆可。
